Description:
This investigation is concerned with Dangerous gas fitting of a boiler in   E Sussex  between 1 June 2019 when work commenced and the 12th August 2019. 
The Gas fitting was carried out by Mr Ryan Bradley a sole trader operating under the name of Sussex Plumbing & Heating Services. When Gas safe visited they identified 17 faults including a fault which was classified as immediately dangerous and two at risk.
